posts.post_title: Looking for T206 Doyle Throwing Sovereign 150
posts.post_content: I need a T206 Doyle Throwing with a Sovereign 150 back.  If anyone can help me out, email me at [url]b.brownbaseball@verizon.net[/url].  Thanks, Bill
